def main():
    t=int(input())
    while t>0:
        n=int(input())
        fc=((n//7)*7)
        sc=n-fc
        while fc>=0 and sc<=n:
            if fc%7==0 and sc%4==0 and fc+sc==n:
                break
            else:
                fc=fc-7
                sc=sc+7
        if fc<0 or sc>n:
            print -1
        else:
            print fc
        t=t-1
    return 0
main()
